body.p: In addition to finalising the chapters on the objective of general purpose financial reporting and qualitative characteristics of useful financial information, the Board and the FASB:

li.p: published a Discussion Paper and then an Exposure Draft (2010 Exposure Draft) on the concept of a reporting entity;
discussed the definitions of the elements of financial statements; and
discussed and held public round-table meetings about measurement.
